Here are the latest data from the employment report.

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
```

```{r}
ur <- tq_get("UNRATE", get = "economic.data")
head(ur)
tail(ur)
```


## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r}
ggplot(data = ur) +
  geom_line(aes(x = date, y = price))
```
